definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 老家伙[lao3 jia1 huo5]

sentences.english: If you plan on not attending class, make sure you have a buddy that will sign u in.
sentences.chinese: 要是你打算蹺課，先保證有個傢夥能幫你簽到。

sentences.english: Scientists in the blimp did not see anything.
sentences.chinese: 小飛艇上的科學傢什麼也沒看見。

sentences.english: A common juggling problem occurs when two clubs collide in the air.
sentences.chinese: 一個常見的雜耍問題發生時兩傢俱樂部在空中相撞。

sentences.english: Assuming, of course, there will be someone there to salute us when we arrive.
sentences.chinese: 設想著，當然，有人會在傢迎接我們掃來。

sentences.english: Don't forget about the guy beneath you.
sentences.chinese: 卟崾忘記，約傢夥丅方您。

sentences.english: "I'm not too sure if every club would have somebody sent-off in the instance, " he told Sky Sports.
sentences.chinese: 我不肯定是否每傢俱樂部有這樣球員罰下例子。

sentences.english: The big clubs will not be getting him and the chairman will tell you that.
sentences.chinese: 那幾傢俱樂部不會得到他，主席也會這麼告訴你。

sentences.english: The club offers lessons in Irish dance and clogging.
sentences.chinese: 這傢俱樂部有踢踏舞和木屐舞課程。

sentences.english: Everyone virtually has never smiled to turn over table.
sentences.chinese: 大傢差點沒有笑繙桌子。

sentences.english: The Blacks enjoy working in China.
sentences.chinese: 布萊尅一傢喜歡在中國工作。

sentences.english: Either you or he has to stay at home this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午或者是妳或者是他必須呆在傢。

sentences.english: He is the son of a wealthy family, but he seems to have come down in the globe.
sentences.chinese: 他是個富人傢的兒子，不過看上去已經傢道中落了。

sentences.english: He is the son of a wealthy family, but he seems to have come down in the globe.
sentences.chinese: 他是個富人傢的兒子，不過看上去已經傢道中落了。

sentences.english: Return home when less than nothing, but asked not loose An Zhujian.
sentences.chinese: 歸時不及傢無有，但問松安竹健不。

sentences.english: Non-industrialized countries also are demanding that rich countries bear the cost of anti-pollution initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 非工業化國傢還要求富裕國傢承擔抗污染方案的費用。

sentences.english: Non-industrialized countries also are demanding that rich countries bear the cost of anti-pollution initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 非工業化國傢還要求富裕國傢承擔抗污染方案的費用。

definition: 15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
plant mentioned in Book of Songs, uncertainly identified as carambola or star fruit (Averrhoa carambola)
